Welcome to Laravel CMS: Out of the box article management system with a modern responsive interface
Convenient content: You can manage your own content at your fingertips
Responsive content: With a responsive design, the best experience is achieved on both PC and mobile
Data Analysis content: The accompanying dashboard displays the content information stored in the database in real time
i18 content: Based on i18next, it provides first-class localization functions and switches application languages with one click
